name: Basilisk (-taq)
description:
Basilisk is a coffeebreak roguelike game inspired by Snake and the letter-y nature of ascii games.

It was designed to challenge the tactical sensibilities of roguelike fans while staying accessible to genre newcomers.

  • Slither to the bottom of a 10-floor dungeon!
  • See the future by spelling out words!
  • Eat off the floor!
  • Spit acid!
  • Turn a mongoose to stone!
  • Go to insane lengths to manage your inventory!
  • Travel through time?!
  • Develop your sense of smell!

More info at http://ataqand.de/throne/games/basilisk
